text: ~Does anyone know if it is possible to report on deals with a filter of a company property (other than associated company)?~ Never mind, I figured it out :faceplam:

If anyone comes across this and is wondering the same: Reports -> Reports -> Create Custom Report -> Custom Report Builder -> Primary data source (Deals, etc) -> CRM [ âˆš ] Companies -> Next

This allows you to report on more than one object type :slightly_smiling_face:
